description: This file contains function prototypes for internal API functions related to HTTP Ato Header processing within the BroadWay Service Delivery System, specifically functions for creating code and name tables and retrieving atom codes and names.

methods.name: HttpAtoHeaderCreateCodeTable
methods.description: Creates a code table for HTTP Ato Header tokens.

methods.name: HttpAtoHeaderCreateNameTable
methods.description: Creates a name table for HTTP Ato Header tokens.

methods.name: HttpAtoHeaderGetAtomCode
methods.description: Retrieves the atom code for a given header token name.

methods.name: HttpAtoHeaderGetAtomName
methods.description: Retrieves the atom name corresponding to a given code.
